data.title: Bedford School
data.meta_description: 2024-2025 Autumn Term 2024 Spring term 2025 Summer term 2025 Boarders should leave their house before 18:00 on the last day of term, half terms and exeats, and should return between […]
data.text:
2024-2025

Autumn Term 2024

Staff training (INSET) day:Mon 2 Sept New Boys' Day (Upper School only)Tue 3 Sept Term starts: Wed 4 Sept (Prep 8.35am, Upper 8.40am) EXEAT:Sat 28 - Sun 29 Sept

Half term starts:Fri 18 Oct (Prep 4.10pm, Upper 4.15pm) Half term ends:Mon 4 Nov (Prep 8.35am, Upper 8.40am) EXEAT:Sat 23 - Sun 24 Nov Term ends:Fri 13 Dec (Prep 11.50am, Upper 12.15pm)

Spring term 2025

Staff training (INSET) day:Mon 6 Jan Term starts:Tue 7 Jan (Prep 8.35am, Upper 8.40am) EXEAT:Sat 25 - Sun 26 Jan Half term starts: Fri 14 Feb (Prep 4.10pm, Upper 4.15pm) Half term ends:Mon 24 Feb (Prep 8.35am, Upper 8.40am) EXEAT: Sat 15 - Sun 16 Mar Term ends:Fri 28 Mar (Prep 11.50am, Upper 12.15pm)

Summer term 2025

Staff training (INSET) day:Tue 22 Apr Term starts:Wed 23 Apr (Prep 8.35am, Upper 8.40am) EXEAT:Sat 3 - Sun 4 May

(Bank Holiday - Mon 5 May) Half term starts:Fri 23 May (Prep 4.10pm, Upper 4.15pm) Half term ends:Mon 2 Jun (Prep 8.35am, Upper 8.40am) Term ends: Prep School: Fri 4 Jul 4.10pm

Upper School: Sat 5 Jul 1.00pm (following Speech Day)

Boarders should leave their house before 18:00 on the last day of term, half terms and exeats, and should return between 18.00 and 21.00 on the last day of the holidays.

2025-2026

Autumn Term 2025

Staff training (INSET) day:Mon 1 Sept New Boys' Day (Upper School only)Tue 2 Sept Term starts: Wed 3 Sept (Prep 8.35am, Upper 8.40am) EXEAT:Sat 27 - Sun 28 Sept

Half term starts:Fri 17 Oct (Prep 4.10pm, Upper 4.15pm) Half term ends:Mon 3 Nov (Prep 8.35am, Upper 8.40am) EXEAT:Sat 22 - Sun 23 Nov Term ends:Fri 12 Dec (Prep 11.50am, Upper 12.15pm)

Spring term 2026

Staff training (INSET) day:Mon 5 Jan Term starts:Tue 6 Jan (Prep 8.35am, Upper 8.40am) EXEAT:Sat 24 - Sun 25 Jan Half term starts: Fri 13 Feb (Prep 4.10pm, Upper 4.15pm) Half term ends:Mon 23 Feb (Prep 8.35am, Upper 8.40am) EXEAT: Sat 14 - Sun 15 Mar Term ends:Fri 27 Mar (Prep 11.50am, Upper 12.15pm)

Summer term 2026

Staff training (INSET) day:Mon 20 Apr Term starts:Tue 21 Apr (Prep 8.35am, Upper 8.40am) EXEAT:Sat 2 - Sun 3 May

(Bank Holiday - Mon 4 May) Half term starts:Fri 22 May (Prep 4.10pm, Upper 4.15pm) Half term ends:Mon 1 Jun (Prep 8.35am, Upper 8.40am) Term ends: Prep School: Fri 3 Jul 4.10pm

Upper School: Sat 4 Jul 1.00pm (following Speech Day)

Boarders should leave their house before 18:00 on the last day of term, half terms and exeats, and should return between 18.00 and 21.00 on the last day of the holidays.
